ValidationRule.description: Ensures that any National Insurance Number entered has the correct format of 2 letters, followed by 6 numbers, followed by a single letter that which is always A,B,C or D).
ValidationRule.errorMessage: National Insurance Number must be of the format: 2 letters, followed by 6 numbers, followed by a single letter (which is always A,B,C or D). Eg: AB123456C
